seller_description: This capo is crafted from high-quality, lightweight zinc alloy, ensuring durability and a strong, padded spring-action grip for precise tension. It is designed to fit perfectly on electric and acoustic guitars, ukuleles, banjos, bass guitars, folk guitars, and mandolins. The capo is incredibly easy to use, allowing quick fret changes with one hand without disturbing the tuning. The high-quality silicone pad protects your instrument from scratches and fret buzz while maintaining proper pressure for optimal performance. With its steel spring and internal memory, it provides strength, resistance to fatigue, and stays in tune with excellent intonation across all frets.
review: Functionality is perfect is perfect, comes with a good package. Good for the price. Clamps all the strings where ever it is placed on the fret board of guitar. Tried both acoustic guitar and electric.
expected-output: The seller describes the capo as a durable, high-quality accessory crafted from lightweight zinc alloy, designed for a range of stringed instruments including guitars, ukuleles, and mandolins. It promises precise tension with a padded spring-action grip, protection against scratches with a silicone pad, and optimal performance without fret buzz. Additionally, it highlights ease of use, quick fret changes, and excellent intonation across all frets. The seller's image aligns well with this description, presenting a premium and functional product. The buyer's review corroborates the seller's claims, praising the functionality and ability to clamp strings effectively on both acoustic and electric guitars, along with satisfaction regarding the packaging and price. The buyer's image confirms the product's physical accuracy as depicted by the seller. There are no discrepancies between the seller’s promises and the buyer’s experience, and the buyer expresses full satisfaction with the product's performance. In this instance, there is no fault on either side as the product meets expectations and fulfills the seller’s described attributes. This reflects a successful alignment of promises and user experience.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
